
grouped_proptest
Function to run proportion test on grouped data.

#### Description

Function to run proportion test on grouped data.

#### Usage
<pre><code>

grouped_proptest(data, grouping.vars, measure)

</code></pre>
#### Arguments 
* data
Dataframe from which variables are to be drawn.
* grouping.vars
List of grouping variables
* measure
A variable for which proportion test needs to be carried out for each combination
of levels of factors entered in
grouping.vars
.
10
grouped_robustslr


#### Examples
```{r}

groupedstats::grouped_proptest(
data = mtcars,
grouping.vars = cyl,
measure = am
)
```


#### Value
Dataframe with percentages and statistical details from a proportion test.
